name: Mercurialis perennis

Head: Pain as from a band tightly across forehead
Nostrils sore, conscious of nose, feels as if she had two noses
Head confused
Vertigo on going down stairs
Mouth: Ulcers on palate, tonsils and back of pharynx
Burning blisters of tongue, lips and cheeks
Great dryness of mouth and throat, tongue feels heavy and dry, numb
Female: Amenorrhoea, scanty menses, accompanied with orgasms

details: Great exhaustion and drowsiness. Tumor at ensiform appendix, very sensitive. Affections of the muscular fibres of stomach, intestines, bladder.
